mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_TEL, POST_CODE, LOAD_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, DEFAULT_DONG, PROFILE_PATH, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분" SS"초"') AS ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE SECESSIONFL = 'N' AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail}
